mapper.insert: insert into recipes_menu (id, `name`, cover, deleted_at, created_at, updated_at, video, sub_name, intro, skill) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intro,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{skill,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update recipes_menu set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted_at = #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, video = #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_name = #{subName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, skill = #{skill,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, cover, deleted_at, created_at, updated_at, video, sub_name, intro, skill from recipes_menu where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, `name`, cover, deleted_at, created_at, updated_at, video, sub_name, intro, skill from recipes_menu
